sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Truck, User, MapPin, Calendar, CreditCard, Star, Phone, MessageCircle, Search, Filter, Bell, Settings, History, Package, Shield, Navigation, Clock, DollarSign, FileText, Eye, EyeOff, Check, X, Plus, Edit, Trash2, Download } from 'lucide-react'; const MudanzasApp = () => { const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState('login'); const [userType, setUserType] = useState('client'); // client or driver const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false); const [activeOrder, setActiveOrder] = useState(null); // Mock data const mockTrucks = [ { id: 1, driver: 'Carlos Mendoza', rating: 4.8, vehicle: 'Camión Grande', capacity: '10m³', price: 150, distance: '2.5 km', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558618666-fcd25c85cd64?w=400', phone: '+1234567890', reviews: 156 }, { id: 2, driver: 'Ana García', rating: 4.9, vehicle: 'Camión Mediano', capacity: '7m³', price: 120, distance: '1.8 km', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1566576912321-d58ddd7a6088?w=400', phone: '+1234567891', reviews: 203 }, { id: 3, driver: 'Miguel Torres', rating: 4.7, vehicle: 'Camión Pequeño', capacity: '5m³', price: 100, distance: '3.2 km', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1601584115197-04ecc0da31d7?w=400', phone: '+1234567892', reviews: 89 } ]; const mockOrders = [ { id: 1, from: 'Calle 123, Centro', to: 'Av. Principal 456, Norte', date: '2024-12-15', time: '14:00', status: 'completed', driver: 'Carlos Mendoza', price: 150, rating: 5 }, { id: 2, from: 'Plaza Mayor 789', to: 'Residencial Sur 321', date: '2024-12-20', time: '10:30', status: 'active', driver: 'Ana García', price: 120, tracking: { lat: 40.7128, lng: -74.0060, status: 'En camino al origen' } } ]; // Components const LoginScreen = () => (

MoveNow

Tu servicio de mudanzas confiable

¿No tienes cuenta?
); const RegisterScreen = () => (

Crear Cuenta

{userType === 'driver' && ( <>
)}
); const Dashboard = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('home'); const tabs = [ { id: 'home', icon: Truck, label: 'Inicio' }, { id: 'orders', icon: Package, label: 'Pedidos' }, { id: 'tracking', icon: Navigation, label: 'Seguimiento' }, { id: 'history', icon: History, label: 'Historial' }, { id: 'profile', icon: User, label: 'Perfil' } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

MoveNow

U
{user?.name}
{/* Main Content */}
{activeTab === 'home' && } {activeTab === 'orders' && } {activeTab === 'tracking' && } {activeTab === 'history' && } {activeTab === 'profile' && }
{/* Bottom Navigation */}
{tabs.map((tab) => { const Icon = tab.icon; return ( ); })}
); }; const HomeTab = () => (
{/* Welcome Section */}

¡Bienvenido de vuelta!

¿Necesitas mudarte? Encuentra el camión perfecto para ti.

{/* Quick Stats */}

4.8

Calificación promedio

{/* Recent Activity */}

Actividad Reciente

{order.from}

→ {order.to}

${order.price}

{order.status === 'completed' ? 'Completado' : 'Activo'}

))}
); const BookingScreen = () => { const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [bookingData, setBookingData] = useState({ from: '', to: '', date: '', time: '', items: [], selectedTruck: null }); return (
{/* Header */}

Nueva Mudanza

{/* Progress Bar */}
{[1, 2, 3, 4].map((stepNum) => (
= stepNum ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-gray-200 text-gray-500' }`}> {stepNum}
{stepNum < 4 && (
stepNum ? 'bg-blue-500' : 'bg-gray-200' }`}>
)}
))}
{step === 1 && (

Detalles de la mudanza

setBookingData({...bookingData, from: e.target.value})} />
setBookingData({...bookingData, to: e.target.value})} />
setBookingData({...bookingData, date: e.target.value})} />
setBookingData({...bookingData, time: e.target.value})} />
)} {step === 2 && (

Camiones disponibles

{mockTrucks.map((truck) => (
setBookingData({...bookingData, selectedTruck: truck})} >

{truck.driver}

${truck.price}

{truck.distance} de distancia

{truck.rating} ({truck.reviews})
{truck.vehicle} - {truck.capacity}
))}
{bookingData.selectedTruck && ( )}
)} {step === 3 && (

Resumen y pago

Origen: {bookingData.from || 'Calle 123, Centro'}
Destino: {bookingData.to || 'Av. Principal 456'}
Fecha y hora: {bookingData.date || '2024-12-25'} - {bookingData.time || '14:00'}
Conductor: {bookingData.selectedTruck?.driver}
Vehículo: {bookingData.selectedTruck?.vehicle}
Total: ${bookingData.selectedTruck?.price}

Método de pago

)} {step === 4 && (

¡Mudanza confirmada!

Tu solicitud ha sido enviada al conductor. Te contactaremos pronto.

Número de orden

#MV{activeOrder?.id}

)}
); }; const OrdersTab = () => (

Mis Pedidos

{mockOrders.map((order) => (

Pedido #{order.id}

Desde: {order.from}

Hasta: {order.to}

Fecha: {order.date} - {order.time}

Conductor: {order.driver}

${order.price}

{order.status === 'completed' ? 'Completado' : order.status === 'active' ? 'En progreso' : 'Confirmado'}
{order.status === 'active' && ( <> )} {order.status === 'completed' && ( <> )} {order.status === 'confirmed' && ( <> )}
))}
); const TrackingTab = () => { const activeOrders = mockOrders.filter(order => order.status === 'active'); return (

Seguimiento en Tiempo Real

{activeOrders.length === 0 ? (

No hay mudanzas activas

Cuando tengas una mudanza en progreso, podrás verla aquí.

) : ( activeOrders.map((order) => (
{/* Map Placeholder */}

Pedido #{order.id}

{order.driver}

{order.tracking?.status}

Origen

{order.from}

Destino

{order.to}

Tiempo estimado: 15-20 min
)) )}
); }; const HistoryTab = () => (

Historial de Mudanzas

{mockOrders.filter(order => order.status === 'completed').map((order) => (

{order.date} - {order.time}

Desde: {order.from}

Hasta: {order.to}

Conductor: {order.driver}

${order.price}

{[...Array(5)].map((_, i) => ( ))}
))}
); const ProfileTab = () => (

Mi Perfil

); // Main render logic if (!user) { return currentView === 'register' ? : ; } if (currentView === 'booking') { return ; } return ; }; export default MudanzasApp;
